# contents

**Instance Property**

The text list element contents without markers and formatting.

## Declaration

```swift
var contents: NSAttributedString? { get }
```

## Accessing the formatted string data

- **attributedString**: An attributed string that represents the string the framework displays for this element taking into account markers and the indentation level of the list element.

items.description: An attributed string that represents the string the framework displays for this element taking into account markers and the indentation level of the list element.
items.name: attributedString
